CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Travel to Destination stage positioned above or below the Make Reservation stage?
SRP.A: The Travel to Destination stage is positioned {below} the Make Reservation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Travel to Destination?
VE.A: The value of stage Travel to Destination is {472}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Book Flight?
VE.A: The value of stage Book Flight is {1380}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Search Travel Packages, with a value of {2376}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Travel to Destination, with a value of {472}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Search Travel Packages to stage Select Accommodation?
SC.A: Decreased by {506} Thousand Tourists from stage Search Travel Packages to stage Select Accommodation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Make Reservation to stage Travel to Destination?
SC.A: Decreased by {397} Thousand Tourists from stage Make Reservation to stage Travel to Destination.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2123? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 670? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 670 and 2123? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Select Accommodation} stage has {1870}, the {Book Flight} stage has {1380}, the {Make Reservation} stage has {869}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination, or from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Flight} to {Make Reservation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation, or from stage Search Travel Packages to Select Accommodation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Flight} to {Make Reservation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Select Accommodation to Book Flight, from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation, or from stage Search Travel Packages to Select Accommodation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Flight} to stage {Make Reservation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Book Flight} and {Make Reservation} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Make Reservation} and {Travel to Destination} stages.
